message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $12,000. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is quite a bit higher for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go down to $9,500. Can you meet me there?
